SEARCH
Module io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format

Interface FormatterFactory.FormatterConfig

Enclosing interface:
FormatterFactory
public static interface FormatterFactory.FormatterConfig
Config needed to create the formatter. Currently this interface is blank but in the future properties maybe added to access things like caching.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default String
    lineSeparator()
    Line separator for %n by default uses System.lineSeparator().
    static FormatterFactory.FormatterConfig
    of()
    Default config.
    static FormatterFactory.FormatterConfig
    ofUniversal()
    Platform independent formatter config that will not change across timezones or platforms.
    default ZoneId
    zoneId()
    Default zoneId if not specified.

  • Method Details

    • zoneId

      default ZoneId zoneId()
      Default zoneId if not specified. If not overriden the system default will be used.
      Returns:
      zone id.

      Line separator for %n by default uses System.lineSeparator().
